newsitem.title: GERMANY: Militzer & Muench expands E.Europe air cargo role.
newsitem.headline: Militzer & Muench expands E.Europe air cargo role.

text.p: German freight forwarder Militzer & Muench GmbH (M&M) said it has expanded its air cargo activities in eastern Europe.

The M&M subsidiary in Belarus is the first forwarder in the former Soviet republic to gain the status of an International Air Transport Association (IATA) approved airfreight agency, a company statement said.
In Bulgaria, M&M is the first foreign company to become an IATA airfreight agency, the statement added.
Militzer & Muench said it has also opened a representation office in the Bulgarian industrial city of Plovdiv.
The forwarder specialises in eastern Europe transport but also has IATA accreditation in Germany, France, Greece, Austria and Turkey. --Air Cargo Newsroom Tel +44 171 542 7706 Fax +44 171 542 5017
